import React,{useState} from "react"; function NewPlayerForm (props){ const initialPlayer = { rank:"", name:"", points:"", tournaments:"", wins:"", losses:"", picture:"" } const [inputValue,setInputValue] = useState(initialPlayer) const onValueChange = e => { setInputValue({ ...inputValue, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })} const submitForm = e => { e.preventDefault() props.addPlayer(inputValue) setInputValue(initialPlayer) console.log(inputValue) } return(







) } export default NewPlayerForm;
